reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Beam: Sustainable utilization of Andean crops

description.narrative: The project aims to develop the use of new or emerging plant-based food raw materials by ensuring their quality and safety using localised processing methods. This would improve the material efficiency and overall sustainability (including social sustainab ility) of the food processing chain. The same processing methods could also be used as pre-treatment methods to improve the stability and usability of food processing by-products.
